00513 inline uint16 
00514 OldNode::getNbrConnections() const

00516    return m_nbrEntryConnections;
00517 }

00522    return (m_nodeID);

00528    m_nodeID = newNodeID;
00529 }
00530 
00531 inline bool  
00532 OldNode::isNode0() const
00533 {
00534    return ( (m_nodeID & 0x80000000) != 0x80000000);
00535 }
00536 
00537 inline uint32 
00538 OldNode::oppositeNodeID( uint32 nodeID ){
00539    // At this moment, the line below is located directly in the code at many
00540    // places.
00541    return nodeID ^ 0x80000000;
00542 }
00543 
00544 inline uint32
00545 OldNode::getOppositeNodeID() const
00546 {
00547    return oppositeNodeID(m_nodeID);
00548 }
00549 
00550 inline OldConnection*  
00551 OldNode::getEntryConnection(uint32 j) const
00552 {
00553    if (j < getNbrConnections()) {
00554       return m_entryConnections[j];
00555    } else {
00556       return (NULL);
00557    }
00558 }
00559
